name: Wrath of Gwendor: Special Edition '97
overview: Help Theos the Warrior to rescue his brother from the clutches of the evil knight Gwendor! To accomplish this you must battle your way through the eight HUGE levels in this game. Each based on a Medieval location. Kill off as many of the Evil Knights minions and monsters as you can and collect as many gold coins as possible in order to upgrade your weapons in the shop between levels. Throughout the game there are puzzles that must be solved before you can progress further. This involves setting switches properly and using the platform building magic potion bottles that are available at the right time.
